item.title: World’s No.3 Miner Zijin Warns of Scramble for Critical Minerals
item.description: China’s Zijin Mining Group Co., the world’s third-biggest metals miner by market value, warned that growing geopolitical competition presents a challenge as nations vie to secure supplies of strategic
